Generation IV.Diamond: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
Generation IV.Pearl: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
Generation IV.Platinum: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its sweet aroma attracts prey. Then it spews poison. The more toxic it is, the sweeter its aroma.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its sweet aroma attracts prey. Then it spews poison. The more toxic it is, the sweeter its aroma.

Generation V.Black: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
Generation V.White: Each of its hands contains different toxins, but both hands can jab with near-fatal power.
Generation V.Black 2: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
Generation V.White 2: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.

Generation VI.X: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
Generation VI.Y: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

Generation VIII.Sword: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
Generation VIII.Shield: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Hidden within the bouquet on each hand are thorned whips loaded with virulent poison. Roserade moves gracefully as it corners its prey and mercilessly lashes them with its whips.

Generation V.Black 2: Route 12 , Lostlorn Forest , Victory Road ( rustling grass )
Generation V.White 2: Route 12 , Lostlorn Forest , Victory Road ( rustling grass )

Generation VIII.Sword: Hammerlocke Hills Dappled Grove ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Hammerlocke Hills Dappled Grove ( Max Raid Battle )
